channel.title: SolPi - Cardano Stake Pool on [SolPi]
channel.description: Recent content in SolPi - Cardano Stake Pool on [SolPi]

item.title: Mission
item.description: We are supporting true decentrialization to the cardano blockchain by running our pool bare metal on-permises. Our pool is fed by 100% solar power and runs on low power consuming Raspberry Pi’s. We donate 10% of our profits to seaspiracy.org to support our oceans.
